attributes.action: This petition is for a no confidence in the house of parliament on Brexit.
attributes.additional_details:
Parliament has had two years to come up with alternative solutions to a no deal which they seem to have taken off the table which was not parliament to take off.
The people voted to leave and the second referendum should be on the government deal or no deal not another vote to remain or leave.
We have no confidence in parliament to make a decision on this basis and we should only have and exstention to make this vote.
No confidence in parliament.
attributes.background:
As we had a vote on leaving the EU in 2016 and the result was to leave.
Parliament and business has had two years to sort out WTO rules for businesses and parliament has had the same time which has been a complete disgrace.
The second referendum should be on the government deal or a no deal.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence.
